isis.stitle: TSI 95-12-15 - Starting and Warm-Up Instructions For Vehicles Equipped With DT 408/466 and the International® 530 Engines With Model "P 3000/7100" Injection Pumps

subjectgroup.subject: Starting and Warm-Up Instructions For Vehicles Equipped With DT 408/466 and the International® 530 Engines With Model "P 3000/7100" Injection Pumps

svcprocinfo.para: When starting and during engine warm-up the following instructions are recommended.

item.para: Start the engine WITHOUT depressing the accelerator pedal.
FULLY depress the accelerator pedal once the starter motor is engaged. Immediately release the pedal after the engine starts.

svcsubproc.title: ENGINE WARM-UP
svcsubproc.para: Following start, slowly depress the accelerator pedal to warm the engine, increasing the engine rpm to 800 -1000. DO NOT "REV" THE ENGINE. Hold rpm at 800 -1000 for one to two minutes (More in Colder Ambients) to adequately warm the engine before applying load.

note.para: PROCEED WITH THE STARTING INSTRUCTIONS GIVEN IN THE OPERATION MANUAL SUPPLIED WITH THE VEHICLE EXCEPT, AS STATED HERE. THE MANUAL(S) WILL INCLUDE THESE INSTRUCTIONS IN THE NEXT REVISION.
